raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Fixed indentation in YAML examples for runner pod configuration in Actions Runner Controller troubleshooting.
- Updated links and documentation for Copilot code review, including:
  - Added new concept files for code review and coding guidelines.
  - Restructured code review documentation with automatic review configuration.
- Restructured Copilot coding agent documentation:
  - Moved enabling instructions to concepts.
  - Added Model Context Protocol (MCP) integration guide.
- Consolidated Copilot Extensions documentation:
  - Merged FAQ content into main concepts.
  - Clarified differences between extensions and VS Code chat participants.
- Moved coding agent best practices to tutorials section.
